channel.title: Systems Under Siege: One Woman's Battle for a Clean House
channel.description: Hi, I'm Emily. I'm a graphic designer working from home, a homeschool mom to two kids, and the person solely responsible for keeping our 3-bedroom house from complete chaos. Spoiler: I'm not winning. This blog is where I share what I'm learningâ€”organizing tactics that actually work when you're surrounded by unpredictable, spontaneous people. You'll get honest talk about what doesn't work, specific product recommendations, and permission to embrace "good enough" when perfect isn't possible.
